description:
"Learn PHP in 14 Days You Can Actually Use"

You'll Learn PHP Easily, or We'll Buy Back the Course!

Dear Friend,

I can hardly believe it myself, but it's true...

Guys who had no knowledge of programming concepts are learning PHP and developing interactive websites thanks to Online PHP Class. I'll explain how it works in a minute, but picture this: You can tweak your website to do something - anything - without hiring a programmer!

The Magic Is In The Method of Delivery

I know what you're thinking: "PHP is complex; I don't think this course will help." But you couldn't be more wrong... In fact, the developer you might have to hire if you don't take this course probably one of my students.

Don't spend hundreds of dollars on a web developer. Learn what they do for a fraction of the cost.

Just Imagine Being Able To:

  • Tweak your website to do ANYTHING you want it to do
  • Modify existing open source such as many WordPress plugins and themes
  • Create dynamic websites you can make money with
  • Land a job doing LAMP (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP) work
  • Write web applications to do mundane tasks and profit from it

...And that's just for starters!

It Might Sound Crazy, But This Course Is the One You Need Now

And Not Only That:

  • The course is fluff-free - you only get what you need
  • You can ask any questions in the discussions area, including having your code reviewed
  • As more lectures are added, you get them for free - You get lifetime access to the material
  • You will be completely overjoyed with the results, or I'll refund every penny!

I Can Only Work with a Few New Students at Any Time, So You Must Respond Now to Avoid Losing Out - The Current Price WILL Go Up

I INSIST you join the course completely at my risk. Try it for 30 days and SEE your results for yourself. Watch your creations come to life! If you're not 100% blown away by the results, just ask for a full refund, no questions asked. But I'm letting you know once you realize how fun PHP is and see your results, you'll consider this course your mastermind forum for PHP!

Special Bonuses When You Join Right Now

Bonus #1: The Exact Code You Can Use to Protect Your PHP Code from Hackers
Not knowing how to protect your PHP code can be disastrous. I include code you can use to keep your code protected from hackers.
Bonus #2: The Cookie-Checker Code
If you want to implement cookies, the code to do so can be very confusing. I straighten it all out for you with code you can copy and paste.
Bonus #3: Lifetime Access to a PHP Guru
Eliminate frustration from having code that just isn't working; show it to me, and I'll give you some pointers to get it all straightened out!

Try This Course For The Next 30 Days Risk-Free

This is an amazing opportunity and there's NO WAY YOU CAN LOSE. If you aren't writing PHP right away, just let us know, and we'll buy back the course - Case Closed.

CLICK THE "TAKE THIS COURSE" BUTTON TO JOIN NOW

You will receive instant access to the course, and you can begin going through every lecture immediately.

Sincerely,

Tom Tenaglia, Your PHP Instructor

P.S. - Thousands of people just like you are already benefiting from this course. Now it's your turn... You've got nothing to lose.

P.P.S. - You MUST respond now to lock in this special price and all the valuable bonuses. Don't miss out and don't waste another day without knowing PHP!

CLICK THE "TAKE THIS COURSE" BUTTON TO JOIN NOW
title: Learn Useable PHP in 14 Days: The Way PHP Should Be Taught
